item.title: Step Functions
item.description: About AWS Step Functions is a low-code, visual workflow service that developers use to build distributed applications, automate IT and business processes, and build data and machine learning pipelines using AWS services. Documentation User Guide Step Functions is a serverless function orches­trator that makes it easy to sequence Lambda functions & multiple AWS services into busine­ss-­cri­tical applic­ations. Alternatives AWS lambda Airflow Google Cloud Workflows Microsoft Flow Price Pay only for what you use Current price
